MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Dale Crescent,  Grayston Avenue and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. Our engineers are on site carrying out repairs on an underground cable fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27PM on 28th December 2020
